verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
HIS NAME IS WONDERFUL,
His name is Wonderful, His name is Wonderful,
Jesus, my Lord. He is the mighty King, Master of
everything. His name is Wonderful, Jesus, my
Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's the great Shepherd, the Rock of all ages.
Almighty God is He. Bow down before Him, love
and adore Him. His name is Wonderful, Jesus,
my Lord.
